articles.author: Michael Wayland
articles.title: Inside GM’s decade-long battle to revive Cadillac as the quintessential American luxury car brand - CNBC
articles.description: Here's how the brand is trying to get its portfolio back into shape and boost its status in the competitive luxury vehicle market.
articles.content:
